name: rpl
description: A website for Raritan Public Library.

scripts.dev: node scripts/generate.js && node scripts/htmlhack.js && parcel src/*.pug
scripts.pre: rm -rf dist && node scripts/generate.js && parcel build src/*.pug && netlify deploy
scripts.build: node scripts/generate.js && parcel build src/*.pug && scripts/update.bash

author: Spencer Gunning <swcgunning@gmail.com> (https://github.com/aemx)
